name: Carson/Tess
_source: s;Carson; You were just stealing from that village weren't you.
s;Tess; What?!? Noooo i was just strolling my way out of this town.
s;Carson; Lady don't lie to me I am a thief as well.{w} I know your lying afterthat first sentence.
s;Tess; No I ain't lying sir now excuse me!
s;Carson; Lady I am going to say this only once... You already pissed me off.{w}{c:move_portrait;Carson;MidLeft} Now listen if you don't want to die in a single slash{w} I suggest you work with us.
s;Tess; I-I understand sir! Sorry for lying to you!{w} I don't want to die I have to do this for a reason! I work for you!
s;Carson;Alright now help us out here!
s;Carson; (Fell for the most easiest trick in the book...{w}  guess my merc tactics still applies to day.)
